title: ADC Main seeks Support Main for botlane domination
body:
Hi! CJEB420 Here. 

I am a 19 year old male ADC main looking for a mature support main to become great friends with and have awesome synergy to hit up SoloQ / Ranked 5s.

I am currently Gold 3 in this off season, and peaked at Gold 1 98LP in Season 4.

Duties include - but are not limited too:

* Tea and biscuit breaks

* Sharing laughs

* Watching OGN / LCS with me (ognTSM ognKakackle)

* Dunking on scrubs for #FREELO

* Participate in Ranked 5s together 

I would also like to mesh our summoner names together and have our own botlane name.

Example:

* Piglet - Poohmandu - 100 Acre Woods botlane.

What I'm looking for:

* Good attitude 

* Mature 

* Good sense of humor / knows how to have a giggle m8

* Can both give and take constructive criticism to get better with me

* Silver 1+ 

[Must have any form of VOIP - Skype, TS3, Ventrillo ETC.]

You can contact me by adding me in game:

**CJEntus Blaze420**

Tweet at me here:

**www.twitter.com/DarkstaAU**

Skype me here: 

**cjranked5s **

replies.body:
> You can contact me by adding me in game:
> 
> **CJEntus Blaze420**
...
> What I'm looking for:
> 
*  **Mature**

Err...

Nevermind me.

Don't be hating on my insane pun mechanics :(

E: 
"I would also like to mesh our summoner names together and have our own botlane name." 

I want  to change it anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=CJEntus Blaze420,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=QVThWiA7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-27T08:50:58.311+0000)
>
> Don't be hating on my insane pun mechanics :(
> 
> E: 
> "I would also like to mesh our summoner names together and have our own botlane name." 
> 
> I want  to change it anyway.

Should be, "i would also like to THRESH our summoner names together and have our own botlane name."

Hey man, I've been looking for people to duo queue with.

I don't particularly main any role, I do find myself playing support a lot and have games on a variety of supports to fit any play-style.

If you're still looking for someone (or just anyone in particular to have some games with) I'm always open. I'm currently Gold 2, I was plat 5 just before the season ended but decayed due to inactivity, didn't get the platinum border either :P
I don't think I'd change my name, I've had it for all my gaming life and am a bit too attached to it to change. It would also confuse my friends list. I have skype if necessary. Feel free to add me on league, summoner name is halowenjo.
hey m8, imma mid main but i main ori so im sure we'll have synergy with ur corki Valerie ball carry engages
